name: Bruce to the Rescue
overview: Published in Personal Computer News #094 (12.01.1985) and in Personal Computer News #095 (19.01.1985). Bruce to the Rescue presents the player with a few tricky problems. You are equipped with a Jet-pack and must search through robot-infested caverns. You goat to find your girl, Sheila. To keep fueled up you'll first need to collect three canisters of fuel before your bonus runs out. And you must do it without touching any aliens, robots or electrified girders. If you lose a life you forfeit the canisters you are currently carrying. You'll also need to find the sword, it makes you invincible so get it as early as you possibly can.
